text:
Bumping this to the top again and adding in the newer idea forum suggestions, since lack of useful form analytics continues to be a HUGE thorn in our side. It's been several years at this point with very little functionality returned to the tool:

• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Reporting-on-form-submission-to-deal-creation-month-to-month/idi-p/908574>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-Forms-to-be-a-Source-for-Reports/idi-p/892188>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Unable-to-create-reports-on-a-single-form-submissions-broken/idc-p/807534#M146408>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Filter-Form-Analytics/idi-p/783748>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Please-bring-detailed-form-reports-back/idi-p/784497>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Stacked-bar-charts-in-custom-reports-with-specific-form-filters/idi-p/803709>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Form-Submission-Reporting/idi-p/746989>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-Forms-to-be-a-Source-for-Reports/idi-p/892188>
• <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Evaluating-Form-Submission-Activity-Performance/idi-p/876927>
Here's an old conversation on this topic where HubSpot's Jon McLaren chimes in - <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1685020953693669?thread_ts=1676662496.879829&cid=C26E7JT8V>
Hello guys! any updates on this? I’m having the same issue
